description:
Compact, self-contained, easy to recharge, and incredibly bright. The VIS 1000’s amber side lighting keeps you visible to right-angle traffic, distracted pedestrians or other cyclists.

  • 4 modes: high (1.5h at 1000 lumens), medium (3h at 500 lumens), low (6h at 250 lumens) and SafePulse (12h at 500 lumens)
  • SafePulse mode offer improved rider visibility, without the negative side effects of flash modes
  • Tool-free mounting system attaches easily to handlebars
  • Quick-release allows the light to click on-and-off the bracket, so you can leave the mount on your bars
  • Textured reflector puts the powerful focused beam exactly where you want it
  • Amber peripheral lights add side visibility
  • Press and hold switch turns off after 2 seconds
  • IP67 waterproofing means your light is ready for any weather
  • Accurate battery status indicator so you know when it's time to recharge
  • Auto-shut-off feature prevents damage
  • Charges via micro USB port, cable is included
name: Light  & Motion VIS 1000 Front Light
